item.title: Intel delivers a reality check after stock surge fueled by ‘vibes and tweets’
item.description: Intel’s stock is headed for its worst drop in a year and a half as earnings commentary fails to meet investors’ lofty expectations.

item.title: Economy shows signs of cooling, S&P finds. Tariffs still weigh on growth and hiring.
item.description: The economy got off to a decent start in the first month of 2026, new surveys show, but growth appeared to cool due to ongoing stress from U.S. tariff...

item.title: Yes, you still need an emergency fund in retirement. Here’s how much you should have.
item.description: Retirees can face larger spending shocks than workers, often driven by unpredictable costs such as healthcare.

item.title: This oil-services stock stays red hot, with help from the biggest profit beat in 3 years
item.description: SLB’s stock rallies toward a near two-year high after a big earnings beat, adding to the historic gains it has already seen this month.
